verbs.description: " [ARG1: Very good meetings with North Korea] , " [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: tweeted] [ARGM-TMP: on Thursday morning] , [ARGM-TMP: before heading to Texas to meet with families affected by the school shooting in Santa Fe] .
